title: Get Your Hopes Up
lyrics:
I see the sun waking up the morning
Reviving dreams
I feel the wind on my back with promise
Reminding me
There's a garment of praise for heaviness

There's a new song burning inside my chest

I'm living in the goodness that He brings



Get your hopes up

Lift your head up

Let your faith arise

Get your hopes up

Our God is for us

He's brought us back to life

Get your hopes up

Lift your head up

Let your faith arise

Get your hopes up

Our God is for us

He's brought us back to life



I see the sun waking up the morning

Reviving dreams

I feel the wind on my back with promise

Reminding me



There's a garment of praise for heaviness

There's a new song burning inside my chest

I'm living in the goodness that He brings



Get your hopes up

Lift your head up

Let your faith arise

Get your hopes up

Our God is for us

He's brought us back to life



Christ before me, Christ behind me

I am firmly held

In His mercy, never-ending

I'll remind myself



Get your hopes up

Lift your head up

Let your faith arise

Get your hopes up

Our God is for us

He's brought us back to life
